sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './Post.css' import Comment from '../../../../img/comment.png' import Share from '../../../../img/share.png' import Heart from '../../../../img/like.png' import NotLike from '../../../../img/notlike.png' const Post = ({data}) => { const {user} = useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const [liked, setLiked] = useState(data.likes.includes(user._id)) const [likes, setLikes] = useState(data.likes.length) return (
{likes} likes
{data.name} {data.description}
) } export default Post
